Plot: Carl Panzram is sent to Leavenworth Prison for burglary. While there, he is brutally beaten by a guard. Neophyte guard Henry Lesser feels sympathy for Panzram, befriends him, and gets him ...
Title: Killer: A Journal of Murder
Writer: Thomas E. Gaddis (book), James Long (book), Tim Metcalfe (screenplay)
Actors: James Woods, Robert Sean Leonard, Ellen Greene, Cara Buono
